name: Ham and Cheese Toast Best Friend Necklaces
description:
Ham and cheese toast best friend necklaces!! Ham and cheese is the best combo ever! This includes 2 necklaces each with a charm. Keep one and give one to a friend! A new trend of best friend charm necklaces!!

These unique charm necklaces make wonderful gifts!

All charms are handmade out of polymer clay and finished with a gloss. These charms include a 16" silver chain.

(the photo pictured is a stock photo.. no 2 polymer clay pieces will ever be alike.. i do not use molds, these are completely handmade at the time of your purchase)


[ Choking hazard! Not recommended for ages 3 and under. Please use with caution and supervision. ]

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Sandwich Smiley Faced Earring Studs
description:
The perfect little peanut butter and jelly earrings are here! Super tiny and oh so cute completed with adorable smiley faces. Each piece is carefully handcrafted just for you at the time of purchase. Earring posts as pictures are silver plated. If you need surgical steel, please include that information at checkout- "note to seller".

**don't like grape jelly? Not a problem! Request any jelly you'd like! Or fluff too! Please specify at checkout if you would like something other than grape jelly**


**Keep in Mind that NO two polymer clay pieces will ever be alike! I do not use molds and each one is made 100% by MY hands only!


[ Choking hazard! Not recommended for ages 3 and under. Please use with caution and adult supervision. ]

name: Glow in the Dark Peanut Butter and Jelly Best Friend Necklaces
description:
Glow in the Dark Peanut Butter and Jelly Best Friend Necklaces!! A new item, unique and original here at Pumpkin Pye Boutique! With the theme of Fall approaching, I just LOVE anything that glows in the dark. Just a great little spin off of my original set of peanut butter and jelly best friend necklaces! Possibly a limited time only so grab these while you can! Each charm dangles on a 16" silver necklace chain.

**please specify at checkout if you would like strawberry jelly or marshmallow (fluff) instead. If nothing is specified, you will receive grape jelly** (strawberry will be more like a light pink due to glow in the dark clay)

**Keep in Mind that NO two polymer clay pieces will ever be alike! I do not use molds and each one is made 100% by MY hands only!

[ Choking hazard! Not recommended for ages 3 and under. Please use with caution and supervision. ]

name: Macaroni and Cheese Best Friend Necklaces
description:
Macaroni and cheese best friend necklaces for you and your friend! Super cute and none of your friends would have these! Grab these original necklaces today and show them off to your friends! They make a great gift!

This includes both the cheese wedge on a necklace and the macaroni noodle on a 16" silver necklace chain.

All charms are handmade out of polymer clay and finished with a gloss.

**if you would NOT like smiley faces on them, please specify that you would like them without. if nothing is specified, you will receive smiley faces on each charm as pictured**

**Keep in Mind that NO two polymer clay pieces will ever be alike! I do not use molds and each one is made 100% by MY hands only!


[ Choking hazard! Not recommended for ages 3 and under. Please use with caution and adult supervision. ]

name: Peanut Butter and Jelly Best Friend Necklaces
description:
The cutest peanut butter and jelly best friend necklaces ever!! Adorable smiling faces are sure to make you and your best friend smile! Keep one and give one to a friend! 

All charms are handmade out of polymer clay and finished with a gloss. These charms include a 16" silver chain. These little slices of peanut butter and jelly sandwiches roughly measure the size of a quarter.

These unique peanut butter and jelly best friend necklaces make wonderful gifts!

**please specify at checkout if you would like strawberry jelly or marshmallow (fluff) instead. If nothing is specified, you will receive grape jelly**

**if you would NOT like smiley faces on them, please specify that you would like them without. if nothing is specified, you will receive smiley faces on them**


**Keep in Mind that NO two polymer clay pieces will ever be alike! I do not use molds and each one is made 100% by MY hands only!


[ Choking hazard! Not recommended for ages 3 and under. Please use with caution and supervision. ]
